title: Settings
configApiNotAvailable: The IPFS config API is not available. Please disable the "IPFS Companion" Web Extension and try again.
settingsUnavailable: Settings not available. Please check your IPFS daemon is running.
settingsHaveChanged: The settings have changed, please click <1>Reset</1> to update the editor contents
errorOccured: An error occured while saving your changes
checkConsole: Check the browser console for more info.
settingsWillBeUsedNextTime: The new settings will be used next time you restart the IPFS daemon.
ipfsConfigDescription: The IPFS config file is a json document. It is read once when the IPFS daemon is started. Save your changes then restart the IPFS daemon to apply them.
autoAddScreenshotsDescription: Use <0>{ctrlKey}</0> + <2>{altKey}</2> + <3>S</3> to take screenshots and add them to the repository.
downloadCopiedHashDescription: Use <0>{ctrlKey}</0> + <2>{altKey}</2> + <3>D</3> to download the last copied hash.

AnalyticsToggle.label: BETA: Help improve this app by sending anonymous usage data
AnalyticsToggle.paragraph1: Protocol Labs hosts a <1>Countly</1> instance to record anonymous usage data for this app.
AnalyticsToggle.item2: Country code from IP address. IP address is discarded
AnalyticsToggle.item3: Browser and OS version from User Agent string in `navigator.userAgent`
AnalyticsToggle.paragraph3: No CIDs, filenames, or other personal information are collected. We want metrics to show us which features are useful to help us prioritise what to work on next, and system configuration information to guide our testing.
